version_description:
- Add the free “Young Readers” pages to The Blue Lotus
- Add French audio narration for Tintin en Amérique

Now in Japanese!
Please note:
- The Japanese versions of the albums will be published over time, in parallel with the publication of the English albums.
- The user interface of the application (buttons, menus...) is in English.

- “The Broken Ear” is available in English and Japanese!
- Add French audio narration for “On a marché sur la Lune”

- “The Black Island” is available in English and Japanese!
- Add French audio narration for “L'Île Noire”

- “King Ottokar's Sceptre” is available in English and Japanese
- Add French audio narration for “Le Sceptre d'Ottokar”

- “The Crab with the Golden Claws” is available in English and Japanese
- Add French audio narration for “L'Oreille cassée”

- “The Shooting Star” is available in English and Japanese
- Add French audio narration for “Le Crabe aux pinces d'or”
- Add French audio narration for “L'Etoile mystérieuse”

- “The Shooting Star” is available in English and Japanese
- Add French audio narration for “Le Crabe aux pinces d'or”
- Add French audio narration for “L'Etoile mystérieuse”

- “The Shooting Star” is available in English and Japanese
- Add French audio narration for “Le Crabe aux pinces d'or”
- Add French audio narration for “L'Etoile mystérieuse”

2.2.13
Bug fix
"Tintin in the Land of the Soviets": New coloured version.
"The Secret of the Unicorn" available in English, Japanese and Spanish.
"The Secret of the Unicorn" available in English, Japanese and Spanish.
"Red Rackham's Treasure" available in English, Japanese and Spanish.

- Better App interface ergonomics and optimization to reduce the storage space the App requires.
- Better management of digital content (activation and deactivation).
- Better resolution and optimization for the iPad Pro 12.9”
- Freemium access combining free access to content and paid access to books.
- Samples from the books available.
- New add-ons available (documentary films, audio, etc.)… with more to come!
- New wallpapers and figurines to decorate your bookshelf.
- All The Adventures of Tintin up to Destination Moon available in English.
- All 24 Adventures of Tintin available in Japanese.
- All 11 Quick and Flupke books available in Dutch.
- 2 Adventures of Tintin available in Spanish as add-ons.

- Better App interface ergonomics and optimization to reduce the storage space the App requires.
- Better management of digital content (activation and deactivation).
- Better resolution and optimization for the iPad Pro 12.9”
- Freemium access combining free access to content and paid access to books.
- Samples from the books available.
- New add-ons available (documentary films, audio, etc.)… with more to come!
- New wallpapers and figurines to decorate your bookshelf.
- All The Adventures of Tintin up to Destination Moon available in English.
- All 24 Adventures of Tintin available in Japanese.
- All 11 Quick and Flupke books available in Dutch.
- 2 Adventures of Tintin available in Spanish as add-ons.

- Better App interface ergonomics and optimization to reduce the storage space the App requires.
- Better management of digital content (activation and deactivation).
- Better resolution and optimization for the iPad Pro 12.9”
- Freemium access combining free access to content and paid access to books.
- Samples from the books available.
- New add-ons available (documentary films, audio, etc.)… with more to come!
- New wallpapers and figurines to decorate your bookshelf.
- All The Adventures of Tintin up to Destination Moon available in English.
- All 24 Adventures of Tintin available in Japanese.
- All 11 Quick and Flupke books available in Dutch.
- 2 Adventures of Tintin available in Spanish as add-ons.

- "Explorers on the Moon" is now available !
- Black and white version of "Tintin au Congo"

- "The Calculus Affair" is now available in English.
- "丁丁在刚果" ("Tintin in the Congo") available in Chinese.
- Updated for iOS 11 and the iPhone X.
"The Red Sea Sharks" is now available in English.
"Tintin in Tibet" is now available in English !
"The Castafiore Emerald" is now available in English !
The entire series of The Adventures of Tintin now available in English for a single price. (Tintin and Alph-Art will automatically be added in the coming months).

New albums in Spanish, Danish, German and Chinese.
Optimizations for iOS 12.
The entire series of The Adventures of Tintin now available in English for a single price.
New albums in Danish and German.
New colored version of Tintin in Congo. Available in French, English and Dutch.

- New layout of Tintin and Alph-Art.
- New albums in Chinese, Danish, German, Spanish and Russian.
- Fixed a bug that prevented access to the Tintin.com account.
New albums in Spanish, German and Danish.
New albums in German and Danish.

- Optimizations for iOS 13
- New albums in Spanish

- “Tintin in the Land of the Soviets” in Russian
- Optimizations for iOS 13
New albums in German and Danish
New videos in French.
